sentence: He's wrecking the Party] Chaos in GOP Senate Primaries .Ahead of Donald Trump's rally in Arizona tonight, new reports from CBS, The Associated Press and The Hill are highlighting how Trump is escalating the chaos in the AZ Republican Senate primary and in GOP primaries across the Senate battlegrounds and how Republicans are warning they risked nominating fringe candidates who would go on to lose in the general.? Georgia Democrats: Dueling Trump Ads Amplify Chaos in GOP Gubernatorial Primary Today, just days after David Perdue released a new ad attacking Brian Kemp featuring Donald Trump, Kemp released his own new ad attacking Perdue featuring Donald Trump.
title: Thursday Good News Roundup: Republicans in Chaos

sentence: He's wrecking the Party] Chaos in GOP Senate Primaries .Ahead of Donald Trump's rally in Arizona tonight, new reports from CBS, The Associated Press and The Hill are highlighting how Trump is escalating the chaos in the AZ Republican Senate primary and in GOP primaries across the Senate battlegrounds and how Republicans are warning they risked nominating fringe candidates who would go on to lose in the general.? Georgia Democrats: Dueling Trump Ads Amplify Chaos in GOP Gubernatorial Primary Today, just days after David Perdue released a new ad attacking Brian Kemp featuring Donald Trump, Kemp released his own new ad attacking Perdue featuring Donald Trump.
title: Thursday Good News Roundup: Republicans in Chaos

sentence: If 20-year career politician Brian Kemp spent half as much time protecting Georgia's elections as he does scheming to hold on to his office, we wouldn't be in this mess.? In a statement, Kemp's campaign spokesman, Cody Hall, said: It's no surprise that David Perdue and Stacey Abrams are joining forces to maintain the blatantly unfair status quo and continue raising money for their campaigns when the Governor is prohibited by law from doing so, solely because he is the incumbent during a legislative session.
title: Stacey Abrams, David Perdue call foul on GOP proposal to ban fundraising while Georgia legislature is in session

sentence: The biggest primary endorsement flop is likely to come in Georgia, where Mr. Trump is hoping to unseat Brian Kemp, a popular incumbent governor, with former Senator David Perdue, whose distinction in the race seems to consist mostly of repeating Mr. Trump's lie that the 2020 election was stolen.
author: Sarah Longwell
title: There's No Reason to Think Republicans Are Ready to Move on From Trump
